verses.verse: אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver I [am] the man רָאָ֣ה <WH7200> ra-'Ah [that] hath seen עֳנִ֔י <WH6040> 'o-Ni, affliction בְּשֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> be-She-vet by the rod עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5678> ev-ra-To. of his wrath

אוֹתִ֥י <WH853> o-Ti נָהַ֛ג <WH5090> na-Hag He hath led וַיֹּלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> vai-yo-Lach walk חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech [me into] darkness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> or. but not [into] light

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely בִּ֥י bi יָשֻׁ֛ב <WH7725> ya-Shuv Surely against me is he turned יַהֲפֹ֥ךְ <WH2015> ya-ha-Foch he turneth יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. [against me] all the day ס sa-Mek

בִּלָּ֤ה <WH1086> bil-Lah hath he made old בְשָׂרִי֙ <WH1320> ve-sa-Ri My flesh וְעוֹרִ֔י <WH5785> ve-'o-Ri, and my skin שִׁבַּ֖ר <WH7665> shib-Bar he hath broken עַצְמוֹתָֽי׃ <WH6106> atz-mo-Tai. my bones

בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> ba-Nah He hath builded against עָלַ֛י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and וַיַּקַּ֖ף <WH5362> vai-yak-Kaf me and compassed רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7219> rosh [me] with gall וּתְלָאָֽה׃ <WH8513> u-te-la-'Ah. and travail

בְּמַחֲשַׁכִּ֥ים <WH4285> be-ma-cha-shak-Kim me in dark places הוֹשִׁיבַ֖נִי <WH3427> ho-shi-Va-ni He hath set כְּמֵתֵ֥י <WH4191> ke-me-Tei as [they that be] dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. of old ס sa-Mek

גָּדַ֧ר <WH1443> ga-Dar He hath hedged בַּעֲדִ֛י <WH1157> ba-'a-Di about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo cannot אֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> 'e-Tze me about that I cannot get out הִכְבִּ֥יד <WH3513> hich-Bid heavy נְחָשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH5178> ne-cha-she-Ti. he hath made my chain

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> gam Even כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki when אֶזְעַק֙ <WH2199> 'ez-'Ak Also when I cry וַאֲשַׁוֵּ֔עַ <WH7768> va-'a-shav-Ve-a', and shout שָׂתַ֖ם <WH5640> sa-Tam he shutteth out תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti. my prayer

גָּדַ֤ר <WH1443> ga-Dar He hath inclosed דְּרָכַי֙ <WH1870> de-ra-Chai my ways בְּגָזִ֔ית <WH1496> be-ga-Zit, with hewn stone נְתִיבֹתַ֖י <WH5410> ne-ti-vo-Tai he hath made my paths עִוָּֽה׃ <WH5753> 'iv-Vah. crooked ס sa-Mek

דֹּ֣ב <WH1677> do He [was] unto me [as] a bear אֹרֵ֥ב <WH693> 'o-Rev lying in wait הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he לִ֔י Li, ; אַרְיֵה 'ar-yeh כאֲרִ֖י <WH738> 'a-Ri lion קבְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <WH4565> be-mis-ta-Rim. in secret places

דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> de-ra-Chai my ways סוֹרֵ֛ר <WH5493> so-Rer He hath turned aside וַֽיְפַשְּׁחֵ֖נִי <WH6582> vay-fash-she-Che-ni and pulled me in pieces שָׂמַ֥נִי <WH7760> sa-Ma-ni he hath made שֹׁמֵֽם׃ <WH8076> sho-Mem. desolate

דָּרַ֤ךְ <WH1869> da-Rach He hath bent קַשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH7198> kash-To his bow וַיַּצִּיבֵ֔נִי <WH5324> vai-yatz-tzi-Ve-ni, and set כַּמַּטָּרָ֖א <WH4307> kam-mat-ta-Ra me as a mark לַחֵֽץ׃ <WH2671> la-Chetz. for the arrow ס sa-Mek
הֵבִיא֙ <WH935> he-Vi to enter בְּכִלְיוֹתָ֔י <WH3629> be-chil-yo-Tai, into my reins בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei He hath caused the arrows אַשְׁפָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH827> ash-pa-To. of his quiver

הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have become שְּׂחֹק֙ <WH7814> se-Chok I was a derision לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> 'am-Mi, to all my people נְגִינָתָ֖ם <WH5058> ne-gi-na-Tam [and] their song כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. all the day

הִשְׂבִּיעַ֥נִי <WH7646> his-bi-'A-ni He hath filled בַמְּרוֹרִ֖ים <WH4844> vam-me-ro-Rim me with bitterness הִרְוַ֥נִי <WH7301> hir-Va-ni he hath made me drunken לַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3939> la-'a-Nah. with wormwood ס sa-Mek

וַיַּגְרֵ֤ס <WH1638> vai-yag-Res He hath also broken בֶּֽחָצָץ֙ <WH2687> be-cha-Tzatz with gravel stones שִׁנָּ֔י <WH8127> shin-Nai, my teeth הִכְפִּישַׁ֖נִי <WH3728> hich-pi-Sha-ni he hath covered בָּאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> ba-'E-fer. me with ashes
וַתִּזְנַ֧ח <WH2186> vat-tiz-Nach far off מִשָּׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> mish-sha-Lom from peace נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul נָשִׁ֥יתִי <WH5382> na-Shi-ti I forgat טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> to-Vah. prosperity

וָאֹמַר֙ <WH559> va-'o-Mar And I said אָבַ֣ד <WH6> 'a-Vad is perished נִצְחִ֔י <WH5331> nitz-Chi, My strength וְתוֹחַלְתִּ֖י <WH8431> ve-to-chal-Ti and my hope מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. from the LORD ס sa-Mek

זְכָר־ <WH2142> ze-chor- Remembering עָנְיִ֥י <WH6040> 'a-ne-Yi mine affliction וּמְרוּדִ֖י <WH4788> u-me-ru-Di and my misery לַעֲנָ֥ה <WH3939> la-'a-Nah the wormwood וָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7219> va-Rosh. and the gall

זָכ֣וֹר <WH2142> za-Chor hath [them] still תִּזְכּ֔וֹר <WH2142> tiz-Kor, in remembrance; וְתָשִׁיחַ ve-ta-shi-ach כוְתָשֹׁ֥וחַ <WH7743> ve-ta-Sho-ach bow down קעָלַ֖י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. My soul

זֹ֛את <WH2063> zot I אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv This I recall אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to לִבִּ֖י <WH3820> lib-Bi to my mind עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken after that אוֹחִֽיל׃ <WH3176> o-Chil. therefore have I hope ס sa-Mek

חַֽסְדֵ֤י <WH2617> chas-Dei mercies יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh [It is of] the LORD'S כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki indeed לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- never תָ֔מְנוּ <WH8552> Ta-me-nu, that we are not consumed כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki indeed לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- never כָל֖וּ <WH3615> cha-Lu fail רַחֲמָֽיו׃ <WH7356> ra-cha-Mav. because his compassions
חֲדָשִׁים֙ <WH2319> cha-da-Shim [They are] new לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <WH1242> lab-be-ka-Rim, every morning רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> rab-Bah great אֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-Te-cha. [is] thy faithfulness

חֶלְקִ֤י <WH2506> chel-Ki [is] my portion יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אָמְרָ֣ה <WH559> 'a-me-Rah saith נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my soul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> ken after that אוֹחִ֥יל <WH3176> o-Chil therefore will I hope לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְקֹוָ֔ו <WH6960> le-ko-Vav, unto them that wait לְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> le-Ne-fesh for him to the soul תִּדְרְשֶֽׁנּוּ׃ <WH1875> tid-re-Shen-nu. [that] seeketh

ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Tov [It is] good וְיָחִיל֙ <WH2342> ve-ya-Chil bear וְדוּמָ֔ם <WH1748> ve-du-Mam, and quietly wait לִתְשׁוּעַ֖ת <WH8668> lit-shu-'At for the salvation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov [It is] good לַגֶּ֔בֶר <WH1397> lag-Ge-ver, for a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- should יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> yis-Sa that he bear עֹ֖ל <WH5923> 'ol the yoke בִּנְעוּרָֽיו׃ <WH5271> bin-'u-Rav. in his youth ס sa-Mek

יֵשֵׁ֤ב <WH3427> ye-Shev He sitteth בָּדָד֙ <WH910> ba-Dad alone וְיִדֹּ֔ם <WH1826> ve-yid-Dom, and keepeth silence כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Since נָטַ֖ל <WH5190> na-Tal because he hath borne עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. and

יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> yit-Ten He putteth בֶּֽעָפָר֙ <WH6083> be-'a-Far in the dust פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> Pi-hu, his mouth אוּלַ֖י <WH194> 'u-Lai Perhaps יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> yesh if so be there may be תִּקְוָֽה׃ <WH8615> tik-Vah. hope

יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> yit-Ten He giveth לְמַכֵּ֛הוּ <WH5221> le-mak-Ke-hu to him that smiteth לֶ֖חִי <WH3895> Le-chi [his] cheek יִשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> yis-Ba' him he is filled full בְּחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> be-cher-Pah. with reproach ס sa-Mek
כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo will not יִזְנַ֛ח <WH2186> yiz-Nach will not cast off לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai. For the Lord

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if הוֹגָ֔ה <WH3013> ho-Gah, But though he cause grief וְרִחַ֖ם <WH7355> ve-ri-Cham yet will he have compassion כְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> ke-Ro according to the multitude; חַסְדֹּו chas-dov כחֲסָדָֽיו׃ <WH2617> cha-sa-Dav. favour ק

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo does not עִנָּה֙ <WH6031> 'in-Nah For he doth not afflict מִלִּבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> mil-lib-Bo, willingly וַיַּגֶּ֖ה <WH3013> vai-yag-Geh nor grieve בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the children אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. of men ס sa-Mek

לְדַכֵּא֙ <WH1792> le-dak-Ke To crush תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> rag-Lav, under his feet כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol All אֲסִ֥ירֵי <WH615> 'a-Si-rei all the prisoners אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

לְהַטּוֹת֙ <WH5186> le-hat-tOt To turn aside מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> mish-pat- the right גָּ֔בֶר <WH1397> Ga-ver, of a man נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged In פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei before the face עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. of the most High

לְעַוֵּ֤ת <WH5791> le-'av-Vet To subvert אָדָם֙ <WH120> 'a-Dam a man בְּרִיב֔וֹ <WH7379> be-ri-Vo, in his cause אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo does not רָאָֽה׃ <WH7200> ra-'Ah. approveth ס sa-Mek

מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh is there אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Who [is] he [that] saith וַתֶּ֔הִי <WH1961> vat-Te-hi, comes אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai and it cometh to pass [when] the Lord לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Unless צִוָּֽה׃ <WH6680> tziv-Vah. commandeth

מִפִּ֤י <WH6310> mip-Pi Out of the mouth עֶלְיוֹן֙ <WH5945> 'el-yOn of the most High לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> te-Tze, proceedeth הָרָע֖וֹת <WH7451> ha-ra-'ot not evil וְהַטּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> ve-hat-Tov. good

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- Why יִּתְאוֹנֵן֙ <WH596> yit-'o-Nen complain אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam man חָ֔י <WH2416> Chai, Wherefore doth a living גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> Ge-ver a man עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- view; חֶטְאֹו chet-'ov כחֲטָאָֽיו׃ <WH2399> cha-ta-'Av. fault קס sa-Mek

נַחְפְּשָׂ֤ה <WH2664> nach-pe-Sah Let us search דְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1870> de-ra-Chei-nu our ways וְֽנַחְקֹ֔רָה <WH2713> ve-nach-Ko-rah, and try וְנָשׁ֖וּבָה <WH7725> ve-na-Shu-vah and turn again עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. to the LORD

נִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> nis-Sa Let us lift up לְבָבֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3824> le-va-Ve-nu our heart אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- Toward כַּפָּ֔יִם <WH3709> kap-Pa-yim, with [our] hands אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- Toward אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el unto God בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim. in the heavens

נַ֤חְנוּ <WH5168> Nach-nu We פָשַׁ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH6586> fa-Sha'-nu have transgressed וּמָרִ֔ינוּ <WH4784> u-ma-Ri-nu, and have rebelled אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo have not סָלָֽחְתָּ׃ <WH5545> sa-La-che-ta. thou hast not pardoned ס sa-Mek

סַכֹּ֤תָה <WH5526> sak-Ko-tah Thou hast covered בָאַף֙ <WH639> va-'Af with anger וַֽתִּרְדְּפֵ֔נוּ <WH7291> vat-tir-de-Fe-nu, and persecuted הָרַ֖גְתָּ <WH2026> ha-Rag-ta us thou hast slain לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo have not חָמָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH2550> cha-Mal-ta. thou hast not pitied

סַכּ֤וֹתָה <WH5526> sak-Ko-tah Thou hast covered בֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> ve-'a-Nan thyself with a cloud לָ֔ךְ Lach, מֵעֲב֖וֹר <WH5674> me-'a-Vor should not pass through תְּפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> te-fil-Lah. that [our] prayer

סְחִ֧י <WH5501> se-Chi us [as] the offscouring וּמָא֛וֹס <WH3973> u-ma-'os and refuse תְּשִׂימֵ֖נוּ <WH7760> te-si-Me-nu Thou hast made בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim. of the people ס sa-Mek
פָּצ֥וּ <WH6475> pa-Tzu have opened עָלֵ֛ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu against פִּיהֶ֖ם <WH6310> pi-Hem their mouths כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-nu. All our enemies

עֵינִי֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Ni Mine eye עֽוֹלְלָ֣ה <WH5953> 'ol-Lah affecteth לְנַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> le-naf-Shi, mine heart מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol of all בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> be-Not because of all the daughters עִירִֽי׃ <WH5892> 'i-Ri. of my city ס sa-Mek
